title: The African scene: youth builds a nation in Tanzania
creator_credit: Encyclopaedia Britannica Films, Visual Education Center, Toronto and H Lemieux
brief_description: Emphasises the importance of “nation-building” by showing girls of a government-operated secondary school in Tanzania helping their country to develop a better standard of living. Also shows use of co-operative farming as a means of increasing agricultural production and improving rural life.
